segments.text: Happy New Year , Thomas . How many joys nice drinks with us , will you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you , I will . What are you up to today ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: First , I am going to get ready for the parade , I have a great costume . Then later today , I am going to church . If you want , I can give you a costume , and you can be at parade too . It will be fun
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , why not . Sounds like fun . Why are you going to church ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My father likes to go , and I told him I will go with him .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Lots of people especially seniors like to go to church , and attend the evening service .
segments.speaker: S2
